org.trianacode.taskgraph.event

Interface NodeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlLoopChecker, DataCable, ErrorNode, ForShowMonitor, ForShowTool, LocalCable, MainTriana, NodeImp, ParameterNodeImp, QueueCable, RunnableCable, RunnableNode, RunnableParameterNode, TriggerNode

    public interface NodeListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive node events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void nodeChildChanged(NodeEvent event)
      Called when one of a group node's child changes
      void nodeConnected(NodeEvent event)
      Called when a node is connected to a cable.
      void nodeDisconnected(NodeEvent event)
      Called before a node is diconnected from a cable.
      void nodeParentChanged(NodeEvent event)
      Called when one of a group node's parents changes
      void parameterNameSet(NodeEvent event)
      Called when the name of the parameter the node is inputting/outputting is set.
